revised_title: Non-Destructive Testing of Welded Constructions: Ultrasonic and Radiological Methods
tldr: This article discusses the importance of non-destructive testing (NDT) in detecting and identifying defects in welded constructions. It compares the capabilities of ultrasonic and radiographic methods, highlighting the advantages of ultrasonics in detecting and measuring planar defects that are crucial for assessing fitness for purpose. The article also addresses the challenges and future prospects of NDT in weld testing, emphasizing the need for further developments and improvements in techniques and standards.
